Package xyz.jeremynoesen.pseudo3d.scene.util

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
xyz.jeremynoesen.pseudo3d.scene.util.Vector
public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
Immutable Vector with vector mathematical operators
